name: Parallelogram
description:
Enjoy hours of pure fun with a twist on the classic break the bricks game style.

Enjoy this unique version with today device capabilities and revive the gameplay simple yet addictive of early-generation video games. The player must knock down as many bricks as possible by using the four paddles controlled by the player to ricochet the ball against the bricks and eliminate them. If the player's paddles miss the ball, they will lose a life. The player has three lives to try to clear each level of bricks.

Collectable power-ups; paddle-shrinker, multi-balls, lightning-balls, frozen-balls & extra-life.

Show off your skills and complete the increasingly challenging levels.

It's time for you to break a few bricks!
